text: America’s public lands belong to all of us. We should start acting like it. That means expanding access, ending fossil fuel extraction, more renewables, and maintaining and improving public lands. Together, we can protect our public lands for generations to come.

On this #TaxDay, let's remember that Trump’s tax policies will raise taxes on millions of working people, while giving $4 billion in tax rebates to Fortune 500 companies and continuing to allow profitable companies like Amazon and Chevron to pay zero in federal income taxes.

That means if you paid one dollar in taxes on #TaxDay, you paid more than Amazon, Chevron, and Eli Lilly – combined. 

When giant corporations contribute nothing while hard-working families pay their fair share, that’s a rigged system.

Trump said that he would stop the pharmaceutical companies' greed.

Well, during the first half of last year, there were 96 drug price increases for every price cut.

We will defeat Trump and do what he won't: bring real relief to Americans who can't afford their medicine.

As president, I will fight for tax fairness for the middle-class. The LIFT Act would give a break to those who work hard each day for themselves and their families. We can’t continue to leave the middle-class behind while corporations reap the benefits.

.@NotreDameParis has stood as a beating heart of religion & culture for centuries, inspiring all who have visited her. The footage of today’s fire is nothing short of heartbreaking. To the people of Paris & France: know that America stands with you.
